01)
    a) 
    C1,6(1001(2)) = X(2)
    1001(2) = 0 01001 = 1 10110
    x(2) = 110110

    b)
    C1,8(1100(2)) = X(2)
    1102(2) = 0 0001100 = 1 1110011
    x(2) = 11110011
    c)
    C2,6(101101(2)) = X(2)
    Sem sinal:
        101101(2) = 101101 = 010011
        X(2) = 010011
    
    Com sinal:
        101101(2) = 1 01101 = 0 10010
        X(2) = 0 10011
    
    d)
    C2,7(100111) = X(2)
    100111(2) = 0 100111 = 1 011000 + 1 = 1 011001
    X(2) = 101101

    e)
    C2,8(110001) = X(2)
    110001(2) = 0 0110001 = 1 1001110 + 1 = 1 1001111
    X(2) = 11001111

2)
    a)
    C1,6(312(4)) = X(2)
    Sem sinal:
    312(4) = 110110(2) = 110110 = 001001
    X(2) = 001001
    Com sinal:
    312(4) = 110110(2) = 1 10110 = 0 01001
    X(2) = 0 01001

    b)
    C1,8(5F(16)) = X(2)

    5F(16) = 1011111 = 0 1011111 = 1 0100000
    X(2) = 10100000

    c)
    C2,6(123(4)) = X(2)
    123(4) = 11011(2) = 0 11011 = 1 00100 + 1 = 1 00101
    X(2) = 100101

    d)
    C2,10(147(8)) = X(2)
    147(8) = 1100111(2) = 0 001100111 = 1 110011000 + 1 = 1 110011001
    X(2) = 1110011001

    e)
    C2,8(D5(16)) = X(2)
    D5(16) = 11010101(2) = 11010101 = 00101010 + 1 = 00101011
    X(2) = 00101011

03)
    a)
    1 0101(2) = X(2)
    1 0101(2) = 1 0100 = 0 1011
    X(2) = 0 1011 = 1 + 2 + 8 = 11(10)
    b)
    1 10011(2) = X(2)
    C2,6(110011(2)) = 1 10011(2) - 1 = 1 10010 = 0 01101
    X(2) = 001101 = 1 + 4 + 8 = 13(10)
    c)
    1 00111(2) = X(2)
    1 00111(2) - 1 = 1 00110 = 0 11001
    x(2) = 0 11001
    d)
    1 011011(2) = X(2)
    1 011011(2) - 1 = 1 011010 = 0 100101
    X(2) = 0 100101
    e)
    1 010001(2) = X(2)
    1 010001(2) - 1 = 1 010000 = 0 101111
    X(2) = 0 101111 = 0010 1111 = 2F(16)

4)
    a)
    11100(2) - 01101(2) = 0 11100 + 1 10011 = 0 01111 (2)
    b)
    0 010.1100 - 1 = 0 001.1100 = 1 110.0011
    0 101.0111 + 1 110.0011 = 0 011.1010

    c)
    101101(2) - 011110(2)
    0 011110 - 1 = 0 011101 = 1 100010
    0 101101 + 1 100010 = 0 001111(2) = 033(4)
    d)
    101001011(2) - 001111011(2)
    0 001111011 - 1 = 0 001111010 = 1 110000101
    0 101001011 - 1 110000101 = 0 011010000
    e)
    100010110011(2) - 110001001111 (2)
    0 100010110011 - 1 = 0 100010110010 =  1 011101001101
    1 110001001111 + 1 011101001101 = 1 001110011100

05)
    a)
    0101011(2) - 0001110(2)
    0 0001110 - 1 = 0 0001101 = 1 1110010
    0 0101011 + 1 1110010 = 0 0011101(2)
    x(2) = 0 0011101(2)

    b)
    101.1011(2) - 010.1000(2)
    0 010.1000 - 1 = 0 001.1000 = 1 110.0111
    0 101.1011 + 1 110.0111 = 0 100.0010
